title: Six Mile Canyon
description: AN AMAZON #1 BEST SELLER“. . . please let someone find me!” Seventeen year old Savannah Swift has been plagued with reoccurring nightmares about a woman being buried alive in her car. Savannah’s father, a Baptist minister, says it’s because she watches too many scary shows on TV. But deep down Savannah knows these dreams mean something significant . . . But what?With the help of her two best friends, Jade and Emma, Savannah discovers something remarkable about herself.She has a gift. But as she begins to use her special abilities, she soon realizes that not all gifts are a blessing. Sometimes, they can be a curse.
author: Kathryn Dionne
